entry.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
entry.content: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

entry.title: Maksim-Manojlovic/Web-tools: Web Tools is a collection of lightweight and efficient tools designed for web-related tasks such as image manipulation, PDF management, SEO analysis, and more. entry.title: nianyi778/unplugin-version-injector: unplugin-version-injector is a powerful and lightweight plugin that automatically injects the version number and build timestamp into all HTML files. It supports Webpack 4/5, Vite, and Rollup, making it ideal for both Single Page Applications (SPA) and Multi-Page Applications (MPA).
entry.content: unplugin-version-injector is a powerful and lightweight plugin that automatically injects the version number and build timestamp into all HTML files. It supports Webpack 4/5, Vite, and Rollup, making it ideal for both Single Page Applications (SPA) and Multi-Page Applications (MPA).
